page.title: 02RELIGION -CHURCHES
page.content: Relatives and members of the Vicar's family, that is the one interviewed, helped with the organisation within the parish of church functions.The churches in use in the area are St.Michael's of Pleasley, Christ Church of New Houghton,St. Barnabus of Pleasley Hill.These are all Church {of England and Primitive Methodist {Church}of Poplar Drive, Pleasley Hill. The following churches have closed down in recent years.Pleasley Hill Methodist,New Houghton Wesleyan Church The Church of God,New Houghton. The United Methodist Pleasley and the Meethodist Chapel near the station. It was said that before these church building were started,there would still be a church there even if it were to fall down,because firstly the Church is a gathering of christians. The Church where they meet secondary.
